data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 2, Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 4, LA Galaxy surge into the attack at Dignity Health Sports Park but Daniel Steresâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Seattle at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 7, In Carson, Ethan Dobbelaere of Seattle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In Carson Seattle attack through Alex Roldan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 9, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
LA Galaxy are whistled for offside.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 14, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Daniel Steres (LA Galaxy) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Carson.
In the minute 16, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Seattle.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 18, In Carson a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Raul Ruidiaz for Seattle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Silviu Petrescu awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Free kick Seattle.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
Sacha Kljestan for LA Galaxy has been booked by Silviu Petrescu and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 22, Silviu Petrescu signals a Seattle throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Seattle will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from LA Galaxy.
Xavier Arreaga (Seattle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 25, LA Galaxy attack but Giancarlo Gonzalez's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
LA Galaxy are on the attack at Dignity Health Sports Park, where Ethan Zubak is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Goal kick for Seattle at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
LA Galaxy's Emiliano Insua breaks free at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 34, Seattle have a goal kick.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Important block from the LA Galaxy defence as Gustav Svensson fires in a strike for Seattle.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Throw-in for Seattle at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 41, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Seattle have a goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Silviu Petrescu has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
In Carson LA Galaxy drive forward through Sebastian Lletget. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 49, Seattle pushes forward through Joevin Jones, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
LA Galaxy's Yony Gonzalez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 53, Silviu Petrescu awards Seattle a goal kick.
Cristian Roldan is replacing Ethan Dobbelaere for the away team.
Seattle make their second substitution with Jordan Morris replacing Joevin Jones.
In the minute 55, Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ethan Zubak's header is off-target for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
LA Galaxy are caught offside.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 64, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 66, Seattle push forward at Dignity Health Sports Park and Gustav Svensson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Raul Ruidiaz (Seattle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 66, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Seattle's Cristian Roldan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Seattle to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Cristian Roldan (Seattle) strikes at Dignity Health Sports Park but his header is cleared.
Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a first substitution, with Chicharito replacing Ethan Zubak.
Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's second substitution at Dignity Health Sports Park with Efrain Alvarez replacing Sacha Kljestan.
Seattle's Cristian Roldan breaks free at Dignity Health Sports Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Carson.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
Shane O'Neill (Seattle) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 74, Joao Paulo is replacing Jordy Delem for Seattle at Dignity Health Sports Park.
In the minute 75, Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 77, Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Chicharito puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Efrain Alvarez instrumental with a fine assist.
In Carson a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Yony Gonzalez with Rolf Feltscher.
Gustav Svensson (Seattle) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 84, Can Seattle capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sebastian Lletget (LA Galaxy) gets a yellow card.
Great shot from Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 86, Silviu Petrescu awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Nouhou Tolo with Jimmy Medranda. This is the fourth substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
Will Bruin is on a sub for Alex Roldan for Seattle.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
LA Galaxy drives forward and Chicharito gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Joao Paulo of Seattle gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 88, Silviu Petrescu awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Seattle throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Seattle's Will Bruin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
LA Galaxy are coming forward and Chicharito gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Carson.
Silviu Petrescu will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Dignity Health Sports Park.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
David Bingham (LA Galaxy) has received a first yellow card.
Raul Ruidiaz is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Jordan Morris with an assist there.
